June 22, 1912 D Lincoln Temperance Fete and Gala Brass Band Contest
Lincoln Temperance Fete and Gala Brass Band Contest 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest
lincoln-temperance-fete-and-gala-brass-b-1498
None
Test Piece Contest
Rigoletto [unknown arranger]
Lincoln Arboretum, Lincoln, Lincolnshire, England, UK 1st prize £20, 2nd prize £10, 3rd prize £5, 4th prize £3. Best cornet Goodshaw, best trombone Goodshaw, best euphonium Batley. 10 bands competed 23rd annual contest held for temperance fete.
Sept. 29, 2012, 2:15 p.m. Sept. 27, 2018, 8:54 p.m.
1 BMP (Europe) Goodshaw Band Alexander Owen
2 Batley Old Alfred Gray
3 City of Lincoln Band Angus Holden
4 Boots Plaisaunce Alexander Owen
Unknown Result Band of the Lincolnshire Fire Brigade Unknown

Unknown Result Gainsborough Britannia Works Band Samuel Schofield
